articles.title: New Brunswick reports 10 new COVID-19 cases, declares outbreak at nursing home - Global News
articles.description: The province said the outbreak was declared following one recent confirmed case of COVID-19 at Villa Maria in Zone 1 (Moncton region).
articles.content:
